entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
